## `gdocker run`, `gdocker wdrun`

Run commands inside Docker containers with user, group (`run`), and working directory (`wdrun`) presets.

To see help and available options for these commands:

```{bash}
#| eval: false
gdocker help run
# gdocker help wdrun
```

```{bash}
#| echo: false
gdocker help run
```

Example: Run a simple command in the ubuntu_a image:

```{bash}
gdocker run ubuntu_a bash -c 'echo "Hello `uname`"'
```

Example: Run a command in the ubuntu_a image with working directory and verbosity options:

```{bash}
gdocker wdrun --verbose 0 --- ubuntu_a ls docker_images/arm | head -4
```
